data.text: Thank you for donating to the #Macedonia #Wildfire Relief Fund - every bit helps! #wildfires #fires

When preparing for a #wildfire, it can be easy to forget that our #pets need to be prepared too! After making your #emergencykit, don't forget to make one for your pets' needs too. 

Learn how to prepare your pets for an emergency evacuation: https://t.co/aHd0lbXpLV https://t.co/9L98IUrMfF

Join us at the @HeatandFireExpo USA in Miami, February 7-8, 2022. With #wildfire season starting earlier than ever, the need for controlling wildfire loss has never been greater. 

Here's a preview of what you'll see in our booth: https://t.co/sI6PCpkp98

Increasing avg temps do make fire seasons longer, but climate change does not start fires (humans and lightning are the two biggest culprits)  nor do they make them burn hotter. That’s fuel load and fuel loads can be reduced by work crews and a competent government. #wildfire https://t.co/m1ZcYNnlfs

There was no war you lost, heros.

We know you from the way you bring the blazes to their knees. You never give up! We know that from planting the saplings by scraping the ashes with your hands.

Green homeland rises from the ashes as long as you love homeland.
